current.variables.new_manager); changeGroupManager.update(); } } //Add new users to the group var newMembers = groupMembers.toString().split(',').filter(isPresentInGroup); newMembers.toString().split(",").forEach(function (userId) { if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) { var addGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); addGroupMembers.initialize(); addGroupMembers.setValue("group", groupName.toString()); addGroupMembers.setValue("user", userId); addGroupMembers.insert(); } }); //Get the existing users from the group function isPresentInGroup(userId){ var gr=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); gr.addQuery('user', userId); gr.addQuery('group', groupName); gr.query(); if(gr.next()){ return false; }else{ return true; } } var groupMembersArray = []; groupMembersArray = groupMembers.toString().split(","); var grMembers =[]; var grGroupMembers =new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupName); grGroupMembers.query(); while(grGroupMembers.next()){ grMembers.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user')); } //Get de-selected users from Glidelist var removeMembers =[]; grMembers.forEach(function(item){ if(groupMembersArray.indexOf(item)==-1){ removeMembers.push(item); } }); //Remove de-selected users from the group var removeGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); removeGroupMembers.addQuery("group", groupName); removeGroupMembers.addQuery('user','IN',removeMembers); removeGroupMembers.query();
